events.message: I received the wrong item in my order and would like to request a refund as soon as possible because this is not what I paid for.
The customer's message contains keywords indicating a refund request for a wrong product delivery, categorising the issue under 'Refund'.
Assigning the refund case to the returns and refunds team to handle the customer's refund request promptly.
Hello, thank you for reaching out. I understand you received the wrong item and would like to help you with your refund request.
Could you please provide the order number and photos of the item you received so we can verify and process your refund quickly?
Sure, my order number is 12345678 and I have attached photos showing that the item I got is different from what was described online.
Thank you for the information. We will process a full refund to your original payment method within 5 business days and arrange a free return for the incorrect item.
Thanks for the quick response and refund offer. I appreciate the free return process, this makes things much easier.
The refund has been initiated and you should receive a confirmation email shortly. Please use the pre-paid label we sent to return the incorrect item.
Just checking in to confirm you have received your refund and the return process was completed to your satisfaction.
Since your refund is complete and you have returned the product, we are closing this case. Please contact us again if you need further assistance.
